name: Cat Climber
description:
A 3 level climbing game made for FFS 2022 Game Jam. First Game Jam and first finished project ever. Move back and forth with the arrows keys or 'A' and 'D'. Mouse click for buttons.

Special thanks to Bensound.com, OpenGameArt (for more music/sound effects), and coffee. You the real MVP.

NOTE: I have not included mute buttons yet.
